changelog:
v1.2.0 - Hierarchical Organization

• Hierarchical folder structure
  - Drums/Kicks, Drums/Hats/Open, Melodics/Synths, etc.
• Post-scan summary with stats in GUI
• Smart recommendations after scan
• Open Folder / Open Report buttons
• 26 categories with 400+ keywords
• 79% auto-categorization rate
• 12GB duplicate detection on test library
